cause.description:
This poor little boy that has done no harm is in the hospital suffering from being shook by his babysitter!!! He needs our prayers and help!!! Donations and our prayers will help this sweet little boy so do anything u can do to help the family will be thankful!!!
1. Baby Kaleb should not be suffering like this
2. No baby should have to go through this!!
3. And no family should suffer like this family is suffering!!
cause.mission: PRAY THAT THIS SWEET LITTLE BOY IS OK!!!!
cause.name: PRAY FOR BABY KALEB
